action.action-desc: Mr. Lawler introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to expand the scope of funding used by the counterterrorism bureau of the Department of State to allow assistance to be made available to counterterrorism-focused military and intelligence units.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Coordinated Counterterrorism Act.
Section 571 of the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 (22 U.S.C. 2349aa) is amendedâ€”
